name: Personal Finance
description: Money management, budgeting, and investing basics.

lessons.title: Creating a Monthly Budget
lessons.content: A budget helps you understand where your money goes. Start by listing all income sources and fixed expenses like rent. Then allocate funds for variable expenses and savings. Use apps or spreadsheets to track spending.
lessons.name: Taxes 101

lessons.title: Understanding Tax Forms
lessons.content: Learn about W-2, 1099, and deductions. Keep records year-round. Consider tax-advantaged accounts like 401(k).

lessons.title: Improving Your Credit Score
lessons.content: Pay bills on time, reduce debt utilization below 30%, and check your credit report annually for free at AnnualCreditReport.com.

subjects.name: Cooking & Nutrition
subjects.description: Practical kitchen skills and healthy meal planning.

lessons.title: Knife Safety and Handling
lessons.content: Use sharp knives, proper grip, and cutting boards. Learn basic cuts: chop, dice, mince. Always cut away from your body.

lessons.title: Weekly Meal Planning
lessons.content: Plan meals for the week, make shopping lists, and prep ingredients ahead. This saves time and reduces food waste.

lessons.title: Grilling and Baking
lessons.content: Grill with marinades for flavor without extra fat. Bake vegetables with herbs for healthy sides.

lessons.title: Stovetop Cooking Methods
lessons.content: Learn sautéing, boiling, steaming. Use medium heat to avoid burning. Stir frequently for even cooking.

lessons.title: Recipe Interpretation
lessons.content: Recipes list ingredients first, then steps. Abbreviations: tsp (teaspoon), tbsp (tablespoon), c (cup). Adjust for dietary needs.

lessons.title: Preventing Foodborne Illness
lessons.content: Wash hands and surfaces. Cook to proper temperatures (165°F for poultry). Refrigerate leftovers within 2 hours.

subjects.name: Household & Home Maintenance
subjects.description: Keep your home functioning and tidy.

lessons.title: Fixing a Leaky Faucet
lessons.content: Turn off water, disassemble faucet, replace washers or cartridge. Use plumber's tape for seals.

lessons.title: Daily Cleaning Checklist
lessons.content: Wipe counters, vacuum floors, clean bathroom daily. Deep clean weekly: appliances, windows, baseboards.

lessons.title: Essential Home Tools
lessons.content: Hammer, screwdriver set, pliers, tape measure, level. Store in toolbox, keep sharp and clean.

lessons.title: Spring Cleaning Tips
lessons.content: Declutter closets, clean gutters, check for leaks. Fall: seal windows, service HVAC.

lessons.title: Refrigerator Care
lessons.content: Clean coils twice yearly, check seals, defrost freezer. Keep at 40°F or below.

subjects.name: Health & First Aid
subjects.description: Everyday health, first response, and wellbeing.

lessons.title: Treating Minor Cuts
lessons.content: Clean with soap and water, apply antibiotic ointment, cover with bandage. Change daily, watch for infection signs.

lessons.title: Adult CPR Steps
lessons.content: Check responsiveness, call emergency services, perform 30 compressions then 2 breaths. Use AED if available.

lessons.title: Reading Medication Labels
lessons.content: Check dosage, frequency, expiration. Store properly, dispose of old meds safely.

lessons.title: Better Sleep Habits
lessons.content: Maintain consistent schedule, create dark/cool bedroom, avoid screens before bed. Manage stress with exercise, meditation.

lessons.title: Daily Wellness Routine
lessons.content: Exercise 30 minutes daily, eat balanced meals, stay hydrated, practice good hygiene.

lessons.title: Writing an Effective Resume
lessons.content: Use action verbs, quantify achievements, tailor to job. Keep to 1 page, proofread carefully.

lessons.title: Building Professional Connections
lessons.content: Attend events, use LinkedIn, follow up with contacts. Offer value before asking for help.

lessons.title: Prioritizing Tasks
lessons.content: Use Eisenhower matrix: urgent/important. Break large tasks into smaller steps, set deadlines.

lessons.title: Professional Email Writing
lessons.content: Clear subject line, proper greeting, concise body, professional sign-off. Proofread before sending.

lessons.title: Salary Negotiation Tips
lessons.content: Research market rates, practice your pitch, focus on value you bring. Be prepared to walk away.

subjects.name: Digital Literacy
subjects.description: Everyday tech skills for modern life.

lessons.title: Creating Strong Passwords
lessons.content: Use 12+ characters, mix cases/symbols/numbers. Use password manager, enable 2FA.

lessons.title: File Organization Strategies
lessons.content: Create folder structure, use descriptive names, backup to cloud/external drive regularly.

lessons.title: Calendar and Task Apps
lessons.content: Use Google Calendar/Outlook for scheduling, Todoist/Trello for tasks. Set reminders.

lessons.title: Social Media Privacy
lessons.content: Set profiles to private, limit sharing, review app permissions regularly.

lessons.title: Fixing Slow Computer
lessons.content: Clear cache/temp files, run antivirus, check disk space, update software.

lessons.title: Active Listening Techniques
lessons.content: Give full attention, ask clarifying questions, paraphrase to show understanding.

lessons.title: Resolving Disputes Peacefully
lessons.content: Stay calm, use 'I' statements, find common ground, seek compromise.

lessons.title: Constructive Feedback
lessons.content: Be specific, focus on behavior not person, balance positive with improvement areas.

lessons.title: Setting Healthy Boundaries
lessons.content: Communicate needs clearly, respect others' boundaries, say no without guilt.

subjects.name: Practical Life Skills
subjects.description: Hands-on tasks useful for daily independence.

lessons.title: Doing Laundry Properly
lessons.content: Sort clothes, check labels, use appropriate detergent/water temp. Air dry when possible.

lessons.title: Checking Oil and Tires
lessons.content: Check oil monthly, tires for pressure/wear. Keep emergency kit in car.

lessons.title: Efficient Packing
lessons.content: Make list, roll clothes, use packing cubes. Pack essentials: ID, meds, chargers.

lessons.title: Managing Household Expenses
lessons.content: Track all bills, compare utility providers, shop sales for big purchases.

lessons.title: Smart Grocery Shopping
lessons.content: Make list, check pantry first, compare prices, buy in season produce.
